heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Chance of a flurry from Route 4 northward. Temperatures from the mid teens to around 20, except low to mid teens far north. West to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing south, partly to mostly cloudy north. Lows from 5 to 15 above, cold hollows around zero. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming light and variable east of the Greens.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. A rising chance of snow showers from the northern Greens westward, otherwise chance late, except slight chance southeast. Highs in the low to mid 20s. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
